sentences.en: Advertising agencies are losing their once-powerful grip on brand marketing.
sentences.cn: 广告代理公司正逐渐丧失曾经对品牌营销的有力控制。

sentences.en: Banning cigarette advertising would be unconstitutional, since selling cigarettes is legal.
sentences.cn: 既然出售香烟是合法的，那么禁止做香烟广告就是违宪的。

sentences.en: Britain's health experts are pushing for a ban on all cigarette advertising.
sentences.cn: 英国的健康专家正努力争取取缔任何形式的香烟广告。

sentences.en: Clever advertising would seduce more people into smoking.
sentences.cn: 巧妙策划的广告会引诱更多的人吸烟。

sentences.en: Direct mail advertising is of course a huge business.
sentences.cn: 直接邮寄广告当然是一笔巨大的生意。

sentences.en: During 1984, Remington spent a lot of money on advertising and promotion.
sentences.cn: 1984年，雷明顿公司在广告和促销方面花费了大量的资金。

sentences.en: He is making money and receiving free advertising to boot!
sentences.cn: 他既挣了钱，又做了免费的广告！

sentences.en: I certainly think there should be a ban on tobacco advertising.
sentences.cn: 我确实认为应该禁止香烟广告.

sentences.en: Many farms are jumping on the bandwagon and advertising organically grown food.
sentences.cn: 很多农场正赶潮流宣传有机食品。

sentences.en: Mr Morris feels the museum is using advertising to good effect.
sentences.cn: 莫里斯先生认为博物馆作的广告卓有成效。

sentences.en: Players should be allowed to earn money from advertising.
sentences.cn: 应该允许运动员拍广告挣钱。

sentences.en: The advertising agency rang up 1.4 billion dollars in yearly sales.
sentences.cn: 这家广告代理商每年销售额达14亿美元。

sentences.en: The Advertising Standards Authority accused estate agents of using blatant untruths.
sentences.cn: 广告标准管理局控告房地产代理商使用无耻的谎言。

sentences.en: The company has been expanding its customer base using trade magazine advertising.
sentences.cn: 公司一直通过在商业杂志上刊登广告扩展客户群。

sentences.en: They might be wise to stop advertising on television.
sentences.cn: 他们不妨停止在电视上做广告，这样做可能是明智之举。

words.tran_cn: 广告客户；刊登广告的人
社论式广告（指常作为杂志中心插页的正式广告文字）
登广告（advertise的过去式和过去分词）

phrases.tran_cn: 广告媒体；广告宣传工具
n. 分类广告；分类广告业务

trans.tran_cn: 广告活动，做广告，广告业
trans.tran_en: the activity or business of advertising things on television, in newspapers etc
